Mana doesn’t recharge and the skill ends when your mana runs out.

nodeList.altText:
This overrides nodes on the {Thorn Totem} tree that affect the number of totems summoned per cast.

Only applies to healing totems summoned by the Summon Healing Totem skill.
nodeList.description: You can control additional {Healing Totems}, and always summon three Healing Totems with each cast.

node.altText:
Your thorn totem limit now applies to healing totems summoned this way, but the limit is not shared with actual thorn totems.

Does not affect healing totems summoned by other methods.
node.description: {Healing Totems} summoned by the {Summon Healing Totem} skill also shoot thorns. {Thorn Totem}'s skill tree, mana cost, cooldown, and totem limit also apply to Healing Totems.
node.nodeDescription: Healing Totem also shoots thorns and benefits from your Thorn Totem tree.

nodeList.description: While in Spriggan Form, you now pay 50% of the mana cost of your skills with health, but you cannot regenerate health and you automatically transform back to human form while at or below 30% health.

You transform back to human form when out of mana or at 30% health.
